org.mini2Dx.core.quadtree

Class RegionalQuadTree<T extends Parallelogram>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.quadtree.RegionalQuadTree<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PositionChangeListener<T>, Quad<T>, QuadTree<T>

    public class RegionalQuadTree<T extends Parallelogram>
extends Object
implements QuadTree<T>, Quad<T>
    Implements a QuadTree which contains regions. Each region can contain a maximum number of elements before it is subdivided into four regions.
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman
